unnormalised: The Amarnath Yatra is seeing record crowds this year, with over 3 lakh pilgrims already having darshan of the ice lingam. Registrations are still open online, but slots are filling up fast, esp. for trips in July.
normalised: The Amarnath Yatra is seeing record crowds this year, with over three lakh pilgrims already having darshan of the ice lingam. Registrations are still open online, but slots are filling fast, especially for trips in July.

unnormalised: Heavy rains in Jammu & Kashmir have caused some delays, with the Baltal and Pahalgam routes experiencing landslides. However, the army and local authorities are working 24/7 to clear the debris.
normalised: Heavy rains in Jammu and Kashmir have caused some delays, with the Baltal and Pahalgam routes experiencing landslides. However, the army and local authorities are working twenty four seven to clear the debris.

unnormalised: Many yatris are opting for helicopter services to reach the base camps quickly. A one-way ticket from Srinagar to Panchtarni costs approx. Rs. 3500.
normalised: Many yatris are opting for helicopter services to reach the base camps quickly. A one way ticket from Srinagar to Panchtarni costs approximately rupee three thousand five hundred.

unnormalised: Local businesses are booming with the influx of tourists. Shops near the shrine are selling everything from prayer beads to warm clothes, with prices ranging from Rs. 50 to Rs. 5000.
normalised: Local businesses are booming with the influx of tourists. Shops near the shrine are selling everything from prayer beads to warm clothes, with prices ranging from rupee fifty to rupee five thousand.

unnormalised: Authorities have issued an advisory asking pilgrims to carry warm clothes, raincoats, and basic medicines. The weather in the mountains can change very quickly, so prep is key! The Yatra will continue until Aug 31st.
normalised: Authorities have issued an advisory asking pilgrims to carry warm clothes, raincoats, and basic medicines. The weather in the mountains can change very quickly, so preparation is key! The Yatra will continue until August thirty first.
